title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When selecting the dynamic text content type, it does not have any effect on the displayed content.
EB: The dynamic text content type should update the displayed content dynamically based on the data source.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the application 
2. Go to the settings menu 
3. Select the dynamic text content type 
4. View the displayed content and verify that it is not updating dynamically.
